EyeChart

//Pengaturan Distance from User to Display Input Unit Snellen Fraction Denominator Screen Diagonal Size Screen Horizontal Resolution (pixels) Screen Vertical Resolution (pixels)
// Drawer menu Dashboard Snellen Chart Tumbling E Landolt C Kindergarten Sloan Letters Numbers Color Blind Dot Test Red Green Amsler Eye Chart Pediatric Axis Duochrome Schober OKN Stripes Hirschberg Aniseikonia Eye Anatomy Eye Education Setting
// Snellen 00.00 Decimal 20/20 6/6 000/000 Snellen Fraction 00.00 LogMAR Biggest Optotype Reached (display limits) Biggest Optotype Reached Optotype Outside Custom Limits Smallest Optotype Reached (display limits) Smallest Optotype Reached
Green shape bigger than red shape Green shape smaller than red shape Green shape have same size with red shape
Plus sign bit too left Plus sign bit too right Plus sign bit too high Plus sign bit too low Plus sign exactly at the center

- Press UP button to increase size

 - Press DOWN button to decrease size

 - Press RIGHT button to add a random char

 - Press LEFT button to subtract a random char

- Press UP button to increase image size

 - Press DOWN button to decrease image size

 - Press RIGHT button to show next image

 - Press LEFT button to show previous image

- Press UP button to increase image size

 - Press DOWN button to decrease image size

 - Press RIGHT button to show next image

 - Press LEFT button to show previous image

 - Press PLAY MEDIA button to show setting image folder

- Press UP button to increase image size

 - Press DOWN button to decrease image size

- Press UP button to increase speed

 - Press DOWN button to slow down speed

 - Press RIGHT button to change stripe color

 - Press LEFT button to show / hide circle

- Press UP button to increase green shape size

 - Press DOWN button to decrease green shape size

 - Press RIGHT button to change orientation to vertical

 - Press LEFT button to change orientation to horizontal

 - Press PLAY MEDIA button to show compare result

- Press UP button to move plus sign upper

 - Press DOWN button to move plus sign lower

 - Press RIGHT button to move plus sign a bit to right

 - Press LEFT button to move plus sign a bit to left

 - Press PLAY MEDIA button to show precise position

- Choose submenu with OK button

 - After choose submenu you can : 
 * resize image with UP / DOWN button
 * change image with LEFT / RIGHT button

 - Press BACK button for back to choose submenu

 - Press PLAY MEDIA button to show setting image folder
Hello blank fragment
